tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (IN So) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN theme)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NN today)))) (VP (VBZ is) (VP (VB Find) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN joy) (CC and) (NN happieness)) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS lives)))) (NP-TMP (NN today) (CC and) (NN delight)) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP it))))) (. !)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Find/VB dep>So/IN nsubj>[theme/NN det>the/DT nmod:for>[today/NN case>for/IN]] aux>is/VBZ dobj>[joy/NN det>the/DT cc>and/CC conj:and>happieness/NN nmod:in>[lives/NNS case>in/IN nmod:poss>your/PRP$]] dobj>happieness/NN nmod:tmod>[today/NN cc>and/CC conj:and>delight/NN] nmod:tmod>delight/NN nmod:in>[it/PRP case>in/IN] punct>!/.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VB Go) (PP (IN through) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN day)) (PP (IN with) (NP (DT a) (JJ joyful) (NN heart)))))) (: ...)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Go/VB nmod:through>[day/NN case>through/IN det>the/DT nmod:with>[heart/NN case>with/IN det>a/DT amod>joyful/JJ]] punct>.../:]
